sections.subtitle: Retention Duration
sections.content: Farmer and officer data is retained for a maximum of 5 years or until account deletion.

sections.subtitle: Deletion Policy
sections.content: Users can request deletion of their data, which will be processed within 30 days.

sections.subtitle: Access Control
sections.content: Access to user data is limited to authorized personnel with secure authentication.

sections.subtitle: Encryption
sections.content: All data is encrypted in transit (TLS) and at rest (AES-256).

sections.subtitle: User Privacy
sections.content: User information is strictly confidential and will not be shared without consent.

sections.subtitle: Purpose
sections.content: Information is shared to help farmers and officers support each other effectively.

sections.subtitle: Third-Party Sharing
sections.content: Aggregated, anonymized data may be shared with research institutions and government bodies.

sections.subtitle: Extension Officer Usage
sections.content: Extension officers may share insights based on regional needs and preferences.
